page.title: 20DUNSTER SCHOOL 3
page.content: Swimming The school swimming pool was built in 1964 in the small play ground. The swimming pool is used regularly in the summer term. It has a heater that does not work very well so sometimes the water feels quite cold. Two awards are taught in the pool (grade one and grade two )and the classes take turns in swimming once every day. There is after school swimming and holiday swimming in the summer. The after-school swimming is held from 3.30 to 4.15. The holiday swimming is from 2.30 to 4.30 and the parents take turns in organising the swimming and clorination.
